item.title: Mecklenburg
item.description:
Flash Flood Watch
...ROUNDS OF HEAVY RAIN WILL OCCUR TONIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... .A LARGE AND WELL DEVELOPED LOW PRESSURE SYSTEM WILL TRACK ACROSS THE MISSISSIPPI RIVER VALLEY TONIGHT...THEN NORTHEAST ALONG THE WESTERN SLOPES OF [more]...
